title: Mekorei HaRambam LeRashash on Mishneh Torah, First Fruits and other Gifts to Priests Outside the Sanctuary

titles.text: מקורי הרמב"ם לרש"ש על משנה תורה, הלכות ביכורים ושאר מתנות כהונה שבגבולין

schema.key: Mekorei HaRambam LeRashash on Mishneh Torah, First Fruits and other Gifts to Priests Outside the Sanctuary

enDesc: An exposition of some of the sources for the laws decided upon in Rambam's Mishneh Torah and a discussion of how these sources impact on various commentators' critiques.
